  • Method Details

    • config

      public FilestackPicker.Builder config(com.filestack.Config config)
      Sets configuration object containing all of your account info (api key, policy). This param is required.
      Parameters:
      config - - configuration instance

    • storageOptions

      public FilestackPicker.Builder storageOptions(com.filestack.StorageOptions storageOptions)
      Storage options for uploaded files.

    • autoUploadEnabled

      public FilestackPicker.Builder autoUploadEnabled(boolean autoUpload)
      Enables automatic upload for selected files. Defaults to true.
      Parameters:
      autoUpload - - whether selected files should be automatically uploaded

    • sources

      public FilestackPicker.Builder sources(List<String> sources)
      Sets sources available in a picker. Should contain values selected from Sources. The sources will appear in the order you add them to the list. Defaults to Camera, Device, Google Drive, Facebook, Instagram, and Dropbox
      Parameters:
      sources - - lists of sources available in a picker

    • mimeTypes

      public FilestackPicker.Builder mimeTypes(List<String> mimeTypes)
      Restricts the types of files that can be uploaded. Defaults to allowing all.

    • multipleFilesSelectionEnabled

      public FilestackPicker.Builder multipleFilesSelectionEnabled(boolean allowMultipleFiles)
      Settings this value to false restricts the selection to only one file. Defaults to true.
      Parameters:
      allowMultipleFiles - - whether multiple file selection should be allowed

    • displayVersionInformation

      public FilestackPicker.Builder displayVersionInformation(boolean displayVersionInfomation)
      Sets whether version information should be displayed in picker's menu. Defaults to true.
      Parameters:
      displayVersionInfomation - - display version information in picker's menu

    • theme

      public FilestackPicker.Builder theme(Theme theme)
      Sets the picker theme (title and colors). See Theme.Builder for more info. Defaults to pre-assigned values.
      Parameters:
      theme - - picker's theming object

    • build

      public FilestackPicker build()
      Creates a new FilePicker instance that one can use to spawn file pickers.
      Returns:
      a FilePicker instance
